borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: Variation of condition 2 of planning permission ref: 2020/01849/FUL granted 16th September 2021 for the 'Change of use from office to 33 residential units across Blocks 1-5; including partial demolition and extensions at ground/first floor to blocks 2/3, and at first floor in block 4. Partial demolition and alterations to block 5 and redevelopment of a 3-storey block; with associated bike storage, refuse storage, parking and landscaping and work to trees' to allow amendments to the approved drawings to include: reduce number of residential units from 33 to 32 together with associated internal changes, increase width of existing lightwells to the front of Building 1, relocation of gym to building 5, formation of new entrances along ground floor comprising of doors to duplex units from the main courtyard, removal of lean to and rear block of building 2/3 and replace with new part 1, part 2 storey flat roof extensions, ground floor amenity space adjacent to Oxford Gate with new doors to the rear of building 2/3 to allow access to private amenity space, alterations to landscaping including new front gardens to courtyard units, relocation of bike and bin stores, relocation of visually and physically intrusive existing ramp to Building 1, and addition of soft landscaping, removal of consented glazed lift and replaced with a solid infill in between Building 2 and 3 to match existing facade, omission of sub-station from Building 6 and changes to fenestration to match designs of the existing buildings, obscured glazing at first floor level of Building 4 and replaced with clear glazing.
